short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,f: Spinner.io wallpapers bring your chrome a new look and useful tools
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,gu,kn,mr,te: Give your Chrome a new look with Spinner.io wallpapers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spinner.io Wallpapers and New Tab brings a fresh look to your default Chrome New Tab page. With every Chrome browser or new tab launch, you will enjoy the Spinner.io wallpapers.

All features:
Random wallpapers: Get a random wallpaper for your browser's new tab page.
One fixed wallpaper: You may want a fixed wallpaper you always want to see, then just click on an image listed in the backgrounds section. You can revert this in the settings section.
Search box: Search the entire web within the extension.
Quick Links: Quickly access to the most popular social media and e-commerce websites.
Popular Games: Play handpicked HTML5 games listed in the Popular Games section.
